A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: wow ! .. that was a pretty painful 2 1/2 hours .. consider this the \"Batman & Robin\" of Star Wars movies .. pretty random demonstrations of the Force that are completely implausible \, random deaths and resurrections \, and an overly long drawn out story line .. in summary \, it's Disney erasing the past Star Wars so it can start something new and slap the \"Star Wars\" brand on it
